name: A Bit Inside
description:
// This game is not intended to be disturbing, but the player is warned that things out of place may appear //

Lost and disoriented in an unfamiliar place bathed in neon lights. Guide to "???" towards the end of her path, without looking back, and ignoring the consequences.
